name: My Cute Destroyer of Worlds
description:
You are obliged by a strange entity to take care of a creature in this game. The entity warns out about not letting this creature reach the power to communicate with the interdimensional zone of primordial life and death, but as soon as the entity is explaining this, they are sucked into a portal. Now you must take care of IT.

This game was made in 16 days for Team Dogpit's Virtual Pet Jam.

Controls
  • Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move;
  • Left Mouse Button to interact;
  • Left Shift or Right Mouse Button to run;
  • Space to jump;
  • Esc to pause.
Some Useful Tips
  • In the supermarket levels, some items may bug and disappear. We tried to fix this, but it still happens sometimes. If you notice this happening with an item needed to progress the game, hit Esc and reload the level.
  • Press Left Mouse Button to skip dialogue.
Something

This is my first game, so I know there is lots of room for improvement. There are some things in the project that we couldn't put in time for the jam (like footsteps). We might update this at some point and maybe even make more levels (or at least the ones we were planning from the very beginning and aren't in the Jam Version). The Brazilian Portuguese translation may be the next update.
